home.title: Dashboard
home.bonusAwarded: Special bonus! Your balance has been increased to 5,000,000 TL!

home.advantage1Desc: Earn passive income by renting vehicles from your garage.
home.advantage2Desc: Buy vehicles from customers in urgent need of cash below market value.
home.advantage3Desc: Sell your vehicles at higher prices as a professional gallery.

bargainer.1: My budget is a bit tight, can we agree on this price?
bargainer.2: My financial situation is not great right now but I really liked the car.
bargainer.3: This is my final offer, unfortunately I cannot pay more.
bargainer.4: This is all I have, please accept.
bargainer.5: This price makes the most sense for me, I would appreciate if you consider it.

realistic.1: I am offering a price in line with market value.
realistic.2: I determined a fair price as a result of my research.
realistic.3: I think it is a suitable price for both you and me.
realistic.4: I checked the prices of similar vehicles, this price is reasonable.
realistic.5: I am here with a realistic offer.

urgent.1: I need it urgently, we can agree immediately.
urgent.2: I need to close the deal today.
urgent.3: I am in a hurry, I am giving the price you want.
urgent.4: I came to this city for work, I need a car immediately.
urgent.5: I have an emergency, please accept.

generous.1: Exactly the car I was looking for, I am giving the price you want.
generous.2: I have been looking for this model for a long time, price is not an issue.
generous.3: I liked it very much, I am ready to pay the fee you want.
generous.4: This car is just for me, your money is ready.
generous.5: I definitely want to buy it, I am not flexible about the price.

highMileage.1: Mileage is a bit high for its age, that's why my offer is this.
highMileage.2: For a vehicle with this mileage, the price seemed a bit high.
highMileage.3: Engine might be tired, mileage is concerning.
highMileage.4: A car that has traveled a lot, might cause expenses.

lowMileage.1: Mileage is very good, exactly the cleanliness I was looking for.
lowMileage.2: It's great that it has been used so little.
lowMileage.3: A car like new, didn't want to miss it.
lowMileage.4: Hard to find low mileage cars, my offer is serious.

accident.1: Having an accident record makes me think a bit.
accident.2: Unfortunately being damaged lowers its value.
accident.3: History is not clean, so I broke the price.
accident.4: I am giving this price considering the accident record.

clean.1: Being faultless is a huge advantage.
clean.2: I was looking for a car without replacement or paint.
clean.3: Deserves this price for its clean history.

expensive.1: You wrote a bit high compared to the market.
expensive.2: If you keep the price a bit more reasonable I will buy immediately.
expensive.3: It pushes my budget but I wanted to make an offer anyway.
expensive.4: Remained expensive compared to similar ones.

cheap.1: Price is very affordable, I want to buy immediately.
cheap.2: Cannot be missed at this price, my cash is ready.
cheap.3: Became an opportunity vehicle, accept my offer.

acceptance.1: Great! Deal. I agree to this price.
acceptance.2: Okay, I accept. Let's make a deal.
acceptance.5: Okay, I agree to this price.

rejection.1: Unfortunately I cannot agree to this price. Thanks.
rejection.2: I thought about it but this price is not suitable for me.
rejection.3: Sorry, I say no to this offer.
rejection.4: I guess we can't agree on this price. Thanks.
rejection.5: Unfortunately I cannot accept. Can you consider another price?
rejection.6: This price is lower than I expected. Thanks but no.

counter.1: Hmm, I thought a bit. How about {amount} TL?
counter.2: Hard at this price. If it is {amount} TL we can agree.
counter.3: How about {amount} TL? Let's find a middle ground.
counter.4: Okay, {amount} TL is my final offer.
counter.5: Let's take a step. What if it is {amount} TL?

accept.1: Your offer is suitable, I accept!
accept.4: Okay, let's agree on this price.
accept.5: I accept your offer. Thank you!

insult.1: Are you kidding? This car cannot be this price!
insult.2: Sorry but this price is unacceptable. You must not be serious.
insult.3: This offer is way below my expectations. No.
insult.4: Did you not research the market at all? This price is funny.
insult.5: Sorry but we cannot agree with this offer. Too low.
insult.6: Impossible to sell at this price. Please be realistic.
insult.7: An offer way below vehicle value. Unfortunately I cannot accept.

reject.1: Unfortunately this price is too low. Waiting for other offers.
reject.2: I cannot accept this offer. Expecting a more realistic price.
reject.3: Vehicle is not suitable for this price. Thanks.
reject.4: Price is way below my expectations. Rejecting.
reject.5: This offer is not suitable for me.

counter.1: I cannot sell at this price but we can agree on {amount} TL.
counter.2: A bit low. If it is {amount} TL it's okay.
counter.3: My counter offer: {amount} TL. Do you accept?
counter.4: Let's meet in the middle: {amount} TL.
counter.5: Special for you {amount} TL is my final price.

finalBargain.1: Your offer is good but if it is {amount} TL let's agree immediately.
finalBargain.2: How about increasing a bit more? {amount} TL would be ideal.
finalBargain.3: Almost agreed! I say okay to {amount} TL.
finalBargain.4: {amount} TL is my final offer, let's close this immediately.
finalBargain.5: I really want to sell but {amount} TL would be fairer.

patienceExhaustedAccept.1: Okay, we talked enough. Let's agree on this price.
patienceExhaustedAccept.2: Alright, I accept this final offer. Let's agree.
patienceExhaustedAccept.3: This took too long. Okay to this price, let's agree.
patienceExhaustedAccept.4: I don't want to bargain anymore. I accept.
patienceExhaustedAccept.5: Fine, I am okay with this price. Let's finish this.

patienceExhaustedReject.1: We talked enough, we cannot agree on this price. Sorry.
patienceExhaustedReject.2: We stretched it too much, this price is not suitable for me. Thanks.
patienceExhaustedReject.3: I don't want to bargain anymore. Not possible at this price.
patienceExhaustedReject.4: I am giving up. Cannot sell at this price.
patienceExhaustedReject.5: This was my final offer. We cannot agree at this price, I will wait for other buyers.
patienceExhaustedReject.6: My patience ran out frankly. Cannot agree to this price. Good day.

skills.quickBuyDesc: Allows you to instantly find and view details of vehicles within a specific score range. Can be used 1 time per game day. Higher levels unlock higher score vehicles.
skills.quickSellDesc: Allows you to instantly sell your owned vehicles with a profit margin. Profit rate increases as level increases.
skills.sweetTalkDesc: Increases the probability of customers accepting your offer during negotiation.
skills.lowballerDesc: Increases the probability of sellers accepting your offer during negotiation when buying a vehicle.
skills.expertiseExpertDesc: Allows you to perform 1 free expertise every game day.
skills.upgradeConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to upgrade {skill} for {cost} SP?
skills.unlimitedExpertiseDesc: You can perform unlimited and free expertise for all vehicles.
skills.xpBoostDesc: Doubles all experience points gained for 24 hours.
skills.xpBoostSuccess: XP Boost successfully activated! You will earn 2x XP for 24 hours.
skills.quickSellConfirmDesc: Do you want to sell the vehicle for {price}? This action cannot be undone.
skills.upgradeFailed: Could not upgrade skill. Insufficient points or max level reached.
skills.dailyLimitReached: You have reached the daily usage limit.
skills.noVehicleFound: No suitable vehicle found in this score range. Please try again later.
skills.timeMasterDesc: Unlock the ability to fast-forward time by long-pressing the game timer.

about.title: About
about.description: Cebinden is a fun simulation game where you can trade virtual cars.
about.gameDescriptionText: In Cebinden, you can buy and sell vehicles to make profit, build your own garage, and learn the ins and outs of car trading.
about.contactContent:
For feedback, suggestions or questions:

üìß Email: info@cebindenapp.com
üì± Instagram: @cebindenapp
about.developerContent:
This application is developed with Flutter.

¬© 2024 Cebinden
All rights reserved.
about.disclaimer: This is a game/simulation app. No real vehicle trading involves. All transactions are virtual and for entertainment purposes.
about.featuresList:
‚úì Realistic vehicle trading simulation
‚úì Detailed appraisal reports and negotiation system
‚úì Manage and grow your own gallery
‚úì Daily quests and surprise rewards
‚úì Character development with Skill Tree
‚úì Dynamic market conditions and economy management

eula.title: Safe Social Environment
eula.description: Welcome to the Social Hub! To ensure a safe and positive experience for everyone, please agree to the following rules:
eula.rule2: ‚Ä¢ Do not spam or harass other users.
eula.rule3: ‚Ä¢ Use the "Respect" feature to show appreciation.
eula.footer: Violation of these rules may result in restricted access to social features.
eula.declinedMessage: You must accept the rules to access Social features.
